review: I love it, its good for its price. Sometimes it does have glitches though.
author: Jennifer

review: Always have loved Chromecast! Turns a "dumb" TV into a smart one, as long as it has an HDMI input available
author: Dennis Carpenter

review: thought i could use it with my iTunes but it requires additional software.... overall I believe its a great idea

review: Couldn't get it to work.  Returned.

review: Haven't used it as much as I thought I would.

review: Too convenient! Just keep it plugged into an extra HDMI port and it is so nice to just flip it over to start watching Netflix or HBO GO - even did Pandora one time. I don't use it all the time - but know it is there is just a really cool convenience.
author: Xhavez
